message.original: <PADM><KC WEAPON_SUB>を押す<KEYM><KC HOLD_BOW>を押して構えてから<ICON MOUSE_WHL_4>で構え切替（初期設定の場合）
message.translation: <PADM>Press <KC WEAPON_SUB> <KEYM>Press and hold <KC HOLD_BOW> then use <ICON MOUSE_WHL_4> (by default) to switch between stances.

message.original: <PADM><KC WEAPON_SUB>を押しながら右スティックを倒す<KEYM>闘波の構え中にマウス移動
message.translation: <PADM>Press and hold <KC WEAPON_SUB> then move the right stick around. <KEYM>Move the mouse around while in Seeker Stance.

message.original: 闘波の構え中に<KC SHOOT>を押す
message.translation: Press <KC SHOOT> while in Seeker Stance.

message.original: 敵を狙って集中しジャストタイミングで矢を放つ
message.translation: Focus concentration on enemies and fire arrows with perfect timing. (The flash when the reticule fills.)

message.original: <PADM><KC WEAPON_MAIN>を押す<KEYM><KC HOLD_BOW>を押して構えてから<ICON MOUSE_WHL_4>で構え切替（初期設定の場合）
message.translation: <PADM>Press <KC WEAPON_MAIN> <KEYM>Press and hold <KC HOLD_BOW> then use <ICON MOUSE_WHL_4> (by default) to switch between stances.

message.original: <PADM><KC WEAPON_MAIN>を押しながら右スティックを倒す<KEYM>助真の構え中にマウス移動
message.translation: <PADM>Press and hold <KC WEAPON_MAIN> then move the right stick around. <KEYM>Move the mouse around while in True Aid Stance.

message.original: 助真の構え中に<KC SHOOT>を押す
message.translation: Press <KC SHOOT> while in True Aid Stance.

message.original: 味方を狙って集中しジャストタイミングで矢を放つ
message.translation: Focus concentration on allies and fire arrows with perfect timing. (The flash when the reticule fills.)

message.original: <PADM><KC WEAPON_SUB>または<KC WEAPON_MAIN>を押しながら右スティックを倒す<KEYM>闘波／助真の構え中にマウス移動
message.translation: <PADM>Press and hold <KC WEAPON_SUB> or <KC WEAPON_MAIN> then move the right stick around. <KEYM>Move the mouse around while in Seeker/True Aid Stance.

message.original: しがみつき中に<KC ATTACK1>を押す
message.translation: While climbing an enemy, press <KC ATTACK1>
